name: That's My Space
description:
In "That's My Space", you take on the role of a space explorer in a thrilling adventure across the universe. Gather resources from asteroids, moons and enemy spaceships, and use them to craft powerful weapons to take down your enemies.

Currently with 3 types of weapons, each with 5 levels of progression and 2 types of evolutions, there are countless possibilities for customization and strategy.

Upgrade your spaceship with 3 different types of upgrades for movement, boost and healing to gain an edge in battle. You'll need every advantage you can get when facing off against the Kryo and Chaos nation. With intense battles and an epic boss fight against one of the nations, you'll need to use all of your skills and upgrades to emerge victorious.

So strap in, power up your engines, and get ready for the adventure in "That's My Space"!
